title: Vegan Tacos
description: Delicious plant-based tacos with fresh ingredients.
recipe: 1 tsp. vegetable oil, ½ onion, sliced, 2 tsp. chopped seeded jalapeño, 1 12-oz. package soy chorizo, casing removed, 1 15.4–16-oz. can vegetarian refried black beans

title: Chicken Curry
recipe: 2.2 lbs Chicken on Bones (cut in medium sized pieces), ¾ cup Onion (grated or finely chopped), 1 cup Tomato (pureed), 1 tablespoon Ginger Garlic (paste or minced), 1 teaspoon Green Chillies (chopped or minced), ¾ cup Greek Yogurt (whisked well), 2 teaspoons Lemon Juice, 3 tablespoons Oil, 2 tablespoons Ghee, Live Charcoal + 1 tsp Ghee or Oil, Cilantro For Garnish

title: Chocolate Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake with creamy frosting.
recipe: 2 cups white sugar ¾ cups all-purpose flour ¾ cup unsweetened cocoa powder ½ teaspoons baking powder

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crispy romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
recipe: 40g jarred anchovies (drained weight), 2 cloves garlic, peeled, 1 tsp Dijon mustard, British Blacktail Free Range Medium Egg yolks, ½ lemon, juice, 150ml olive oil, plus 2 tbsp, 3 slices Ciabatta, 2 romaine lettuces, 100g Parmigiano Reggiano, grated (finely, or to taste), ½ x 20g pack chives, finely chopped (optional)

title: Gluten-Free Pancakes
description: Fluffy and delicious gluten-free pancakes made with simple ingredients.
recipe: 2 Cups Gluten Free Flour Blend (e.g., King Arthur Measure for Measure), 1.5 tsp Himalayan Pink Salt (use half the amount if using table or sea salt), 1.5 Tbsp Baking Powder, ¼ Cup Granulated White Sugar, ¼ Cup Salted Butter (unsalted is fine), 2 Cups Buttermilk (slightly warm; if unavailable, substitute with milk and mix in 2 tsp white vinegar or lemon juice, then let it sit until it curdles), 2 Large Eggs, 1.5 tsp Vanilla Extract, Cooking Oil Spray

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Crispy skin-on salmon fillets with a tangy and smoky glaze.
recipe: 4 (226g) skin-on salmon fillets, 3 Tbsp. olive oil, divided, 1 1/2 tsp. kosher salt, plus more to finish, 1/2 tsp. ground black pepper, 2 Tbsp. apple cider vinegar, 1 tsp. Dijon mustard, 1/2 tsp. smoked paprika, Chopped fresh parsley, for garnish

title: Avocado Toast
description: Creamy avocado spread on toasted bread, topped with optional eggs for a wholesome start to your day.
recipe: 1 avocado, peeled and seeded, 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro, Juice of 1/2 lime, 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional), Salt & pepper to taste, 2 slices whole grain bread (or bread of choice), 2 eggs, fried, scrambled, or poached (optional)

title: Spaghetti
description: A timeless pasta dish featuring a hearty and flavorful meat sauce.
recipe: 255 grams ground beef, 100 grams ground pork, ⅛ teaspoon baking soda, 180 grams onion (1 small onion, finely minced), 50 grams carrot (⅓ carrot, peeled, grated), 14 grams garlic (minced), 2 tablespoons olive oil, ½ cup red wine, 500 grams tomato puree, 2 tablespoons ketchup, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon salt, ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, 225 grams spaghetti, Flat-leaf parsley (chopped for garnish), Parmesan cheese (for garnish)
